instructions.name: change_config
docs: Applies one or more configuration changes to an existing multi-wallet.

instructions.name: change_config_compressed
docs: Applies one or more configuration changes to an existing multi-wallet.

instructions.name: compress_settings_account
docs: * Compressed Versions
Compress an existing settings account.

instructions.name: create_domain_config
docs: Initializes a new domain configuration used for WebAuthn (secp256r1) verification.

instructions.name: create_domain_user_account
docs: Create Domain User Account for WebAuthn

instructions.name: create_global_counter
docs: Create a global counter to index all multi wallets

instructions.name: create_multi_wallet
docs: Creates a new multi-wallet with the specified permissions and ownership.

instructions.name: create_multi_wallet_compressed
docs: Creates a new multi-wallet with the specified permissions and ownership.

instructions.name: create_user_accounts
docs: Create User Account (for linking a pubkey to a multisig wallet)

instructions.name: decompress_settings_account
docs: Decompress an existing settings account.

instructions.name: disable_domain_config
docs: Enables or disables a domain configuration. Useful for temporary suspension.

instructions.name: edit_domain_config
docs: Updates an existing domain configuration used for WebAuthn (secp256r1) verification.

instructions.name: edit_transaction_manager_url
docs: Edit Transaction Manager Url

instructions.name: native_transfer_intent
docs: Creates a native SOL transfer intent with on chain settings.
Intents are one-step transfers that bypass the transaction buffer flow.

instructions.name: native_transfer_intent_compressed
docs: Creates a native SOL transfer intent with compressed settings verification.
Intents are one-step transfers that bypass the transaction buffer flow.

instructions.name: token_transfer_intent
docs: Creates a token transfer intent with on chain settings.
Intents are one-step transfers that bypass the transaction buffer flow.

instructions.name: token_transfer_intent_compressed
docs: Creates a token transfer intent with compressed settings verification.
Intents are one-step transfers that bypass the transaction buffer flow.

instructions.name: transaction_buffer_close
docs: Closes and cleans up a transaction buffer.

instructions.name: transaction_buffer_close_compressed
docs: Closes and cleans up a transaction buffer.

instructions.name: transaction_buffer_create
docs: Creates a new transaction buffer to stage a transaction before execution.

instructions.name: transaction_buffer_create_compressed
docs: Creates a new transaction buffer to stage a transaction before execution.

instructions.name: transaction_buffer_execute
docs: Executes a previously approved transaction buffer.

instructions.name: transaction_buffer_execute_compressed
docs: Executes a previously approved transaction buffer.

instructions.name: transaction_buffer_extend
docs: Extends an existing transaction buffer to allow for updated data or additional time.

instructions.name: transaction_buffer_extend_compressed
docs: Extends an existing transaction buffer to allow for updated data or additional time.

instructions.name: transaction_buffer_vote
docs: Signs a transaction buffer to register approval.

instructions.name: transaction_buffer_vote_compressed
docs: Signs a transaction buffer to register approval.

instructions.name: transaction_execute
docs: Executes a staged transaction from a buffer.

instructions.name: transaction_execute_compressed
docs: Executes a staged transaction from a buffer.

instructions.name: transaction_execute_sync
docs: Executes a transaction synchronously by directly submitting the message and verifying it.

instructions.name: transaction_execute_sync_compressed
docs: Executes a transaction synchronously by directly submitting the message and verifying it.

errors.name: InvalidSignedMessage
errors.msg: Invalid signature: the provided signature does not match the expected message payload.

errors.name: InvalidSecp256r1VerifyArg
errors.msg: Malformed or missing WebAuthn verification parameters. Please provide valid secp256r1 signature arguments.

errors.name: DurableNonceDetected
errors.msg: Durable nonce detected: this program does not support transactions using a durable nonce.

errors.name: DuplicateMember
errors.msg: Duplicate public keys detected among members. Each member must have a unique key.

errors.name: PermanentMember
errors.msg: Permanent members cannot be removed from a wallet.

errors.name: PermanentMemberNotAllowed
errors.msg: This operation cannot assign a permanent member.

errors.name: OnlyOnePermanentMemberAllowed
errors.msg: Only one permanent member is allowed per wallet.

errors.name: OnlyOneTransactionManagerAllowed
errors.msg: Only one transaction manager is allowed per wallet.

errors.name: TransactionManagerNotAllowed
errors.msg: This operation cannot assign a transaction manager.

errors.name: EmptyMembers
errors.msg: No members provided. A multisig wallet must contain at least one member.

errors.name: TooManyMembers
errors.msg: Too many members: a maximum of 4 members are supported.

errors.name: InvalidThreshold
errors.msg: Invalid threshold: must be at least 1 and cannot exceed the number of voting-eligible members.

errors.name: InvalidTransactionMessage
errors.msg: Malformed transaction message: structure or formatting does not match the expected layout.

errors.name: InvalidNumberOfAccounts
errors.msg: Unexpected number of accounts provided for this instruction.

errors.name: InvalidAccount
errors.msg: One or more provided accounts failed validation. Verify that all required accounts are included and correct.

errors.name: InvalidArguments
errors.msg: Invalid or missing instruction arguments. Ensure all required arguments are correctly provided.

errors.name: MissingAccount
errors.msg: A required account is missing from the instruction context.

errors.name: MissingUserArgs
errors.msg: User mutation arguments are required when performing add or remove delegate operations.

errors.name: AlreadyDelegated
errors.msg: This member is already delegated to another wallet.

errors.name: InsufficientSignerWithExecutePermission
errors.msg: At least one signer with execute permission is required to proceed.

errors.name: InsufficientSignerWithInitiatePermission
errors.msg: At least one signer with initiate permission is required to perform this action.

errors.name: InsufficientSignersWithVotePermission
errors.msg: Not enough members with vote permission to meet the approval threshold.

errors.name: NoSignerFound
errors.msg: No valid signer found in this transaction.

errors.name: UnauthorisedToCloseTransactionBuffer
errors.msg: Only the transaction creator or rent payer may close this transaction buffer.

errors.name: InvalidBuffer
errors.msg: Buffer validation failed: contents do not match the expected hash (possible tampering detected).

errors.name: FinalBufferHashMismatch
errors.msg: Final buffer hash mismatch: the serialized data may be corrupted or altered.

errors.name: FinalBufferSizeExceeded
errors.msg: The serialized transaction buffer exceeds the maximum size of 10,128 bytes.

errors.name: FinalBufferSizeMismatch
errors.msg: Declared buffer size does not match the actual serialized size.

errors.name: TransactionHasExpired
errors.msg: This transaction has expired. It must be executed within 3 minutes of approval.

errors.name: TransactionNotApproved
errors.msg: This transaction has not yet reached the required approval threshold.

errors.name: ProtectedAccount
errors.msg: Writable CPI calls to protected accounts are not permitted.

errors.name: MaxLengthExceeded
errors.msg: An input string exceeds the maximum allowed character length.

errors.name: MissingSysvarSlotHistory
errors.msg: Missing required sysvar: Slot History must be included as an account in this instruction.

errors.name: InvalidSysvarDataFormat
errors.msg: Failed to parse the Slot History sysvar: data format is invalid or corrupted.

errors.name: SlotNumberNotFound
errors.msg: The specified slot number was not found in the provided slot history.

errors.name: DomainConfigIsDisabled
errors.msg: The domain configuration account is disabled. Please contact support or try again later.

errors.name: DomainConfigIsMissing
errors.msg: Missing domain configuration account. Include it as a required account in this instruction.

errors.name: MemberDoesNotBelongToDomainConfig
errors.msg: This member is not registered under the provided domain configuration.

errors.name: RpIdHashMismatch
errors.msg: The relying party ID hash does not match the one defined in the domain configuration.

errors.name: InvalidJson
errors.msg: Failed to parse clientDataJSON: the JSON format is invalid.

errors.name: MissingOrigin
errors.msg: Missing 'origin' field in clientDataJSON. This field is required for WebAuthn validation.

errors.name: InvalidOrigin
errors.msg: The 'origin' value in clientDataJSON does not match the expected domain.

errors.name: MissingType
errors.msg: Missing 'type' field in clientDataJSON. This field is required for WebAuthn validation.

errors.name: InvalidType
errors.msg: Invalid 'type' field in clientDataJSON. Expected value: 'webauthn.get'.

errors.name: MissingChallenge
errors.msg: Missing 'challenge' field in clientDataJSON. This field is required for WebAuthn validation.

errors.name: InvalidChallenge
errors.msg: Invalid or mismatched 'challenge' value in clientDataJSON.

fields.name: tree_info
docs: Merkle tree context.

fields.name: address
docs: Address.

fields.name: output_state_tree_index
docs: Output merkle tree index.

fields.name: tree_info
docs: State Merkle tree context.

fields.name: address
docs: Address.

types.name: Permissions
docs: Bitmask for permissions.

fields.name: multi_wallet_settings
docs: The multisig settings this belongs to.

fields.name: multi_wallet_bump
docs: The bump for the multi_wallet

fields.name: can_execute
docs: Flag to allow transaction to be executed

fields.name: preauthorize_execution
docs: Flag to preauthorize execution before sufficient threshold is met

fields.name: payer
docs: Payer for the transaction buffer

fields.name: bump
docs: transaction bump

fields.name: buffer_index
docs: Index to seed address derivation

fields.name: final_buffer_hash
docs: Hash of the final assembled transaction message.

fields.name: final_buffer_size
docs: The size of the final assembled transaction message.

fields.name: creator
docs: Member of the Multisig who created the TransactionBuffer.

fields.name: buffer_extend_hashes
docs: Buffer hash for all the buffer extend instruction

fields.name: voters
docs: Members that voted for this transaction

fields.name: buffer
docs: The buffer of the transaction message.
